description:
This is an introductory course on Fengshui. This course focus on the art and ability to locate and to pinpoint your fengshui wealth area with ease and also to be able to construct a Tibetan style fengshui wealth bowl at the end of the course and to let their wealth grow. It is being taught to you by simple and easy to understand powerpoint slides using very simple english as possible and a fast learner will be able to grasp all the essence of it in less than 3 hrs and a slower learner should be able to master it in a matter of a day or so.

Anyone who is interested in Fengshui may apply for this course as there is no prior skills or assumed knowledge is required.
title: how to find your fengshui wealth area at home or in office
